member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ActivationException
member.summary: The standard exception thrown when a ServiceLocator has an error in resolving an object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ActivationException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ActivationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ActivationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ActivationException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or is zero (0).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.IServiceLocator
member.summary: The generic Service Locator interface. This interface is used to retrieve services (instances identified by type and optional name) from a container.

member.summary: Get an instance of the given .
member.param: Type of object requested.
member.exception: if there is an error resolving the service instance.

Name the object was registered with.
member.exception: if there is an error resolving the service instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.Properties.Resources.ActivateAllExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Activation error occured while trying to get all instances of type {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.Properties.Resources.ActivationExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Activation error occured while trying to get instance of type {0}, key "{1}".

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocator
member.summary: This class provides the ambient container for this application. If your framework defines such an ambient container, use ServiceLocator.Current to get it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocator.SetLocatorProvider(Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocatorProvider)
member.summary: Set the delegate that is used to retrieve the current container.
member.param: Delegate that, when called, will return the current ambient container.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocator.Current
member.summary: The current ambient container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocatorImplBase.DoGetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: When implemented by inheriting classes, this method will do the actual work of resolving the requested service instance.
member.param: Type of instance requested.
Name of registered service you want. May be null.

member.summary: When implemented by inheriting classes, this method will do the actual work of resolving all the requested service instances.

member.summary: Format the exception message for use in an that occurs while resolving a single service.
member.param: The actual exception thrown by the implementation.
Type of service requested.
Name requested.

member.summary: Format the exception message for use in an that occurs while resolving multiple service instances.
member.param: The actual exception thrown by the implementation.
Type of service requested.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation.ServiceLocatorProvider
member.summary: This delegate type is used to provide a method that will return the current container. Used with the static accessor class.
